attributes.action: To outlaw Bonfire Night celebrations and ban sale of fireworks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When this custom began  Britain's population was 4 million. It is now over 60 million. Added to that, UK weather patterns have noticeably altered, (probably due to increase in Earth tilt,ozone depletion and ice melt). It makes sense now to stop this environmentally unfriendly celebration which results each year in worsening of asthma and other breathing problems during the two weeks surrounding Nov 5th. Otherwise how can the UK claim to be aiming to reduce carbon emissions?
